name: Floaty Mew
description:
The Perfect Server game jam entry by Eero Höök / Roikku / Lake Dead

Space / click - Action (for Spacebar, you may have to click on the screen first)

M - Music on/off

N - Sound effects on/off

ESC in menu - Quit

ESC in game - Pause

All assets made by me or licensed to me, no credits required.
